document.full_text: attorneys for rod blagojevich promised to call "prominent" witnesses as early as wednesday when they begin presenting the defense of the former illinois governor charged with using his office for personal gain.
document.title: blagojevich defense promises "prominent" witnesses
lines_and_colors: attorneys for rod blagojevich promised to call "prominent" witnesses as early as wednesday when they begin presenting the defense of the former illinois governor charged with using his office for personal gain.
